about_the_game:
Carbon is a science fiction top-down Action RPG set in a future dystopian earth, where human life is worth less than the sum of its parts.

Earth is gone. Abandoned. An accident during a terraforming research project rendered it a hostile place. Continents became overwhelmed with a mutation of nature. A new plague feeds on the source of energy, covering the planet's surface. Life, augmented or otherwise is no longer safe on Earth. Thousands of vast cities -post-apocalyptic settlements for Earth's evacuated survivors - a new home to the majority of mankind, now orbit the darkened planet.

Welcome to the world of the future, where augmentations are an everyday part of life. Corporations reign, and Earth is no longer the center of human life. Welcome to Carbon.

KEY FEATURES

  • BIO VS TECH AUGMENTATION
Asymmetric gameplay based on augmentation type. Choose Tech (Cyberware/Nanoware) or Bio (Geneware/Chemware). These two paths offer different play styles and affect the overall game experience.

  • BODYTYPES AND CORE SPECIALIZATIONS
Choose your body type, augmentation and progress in one of eighteen unique core specializations. Core specializations provide unique passive skill trees that allow you to shape the play style to your needs.

  • TALENT TREE & SKILL SYSTEM
Choose from over 100 skills and socket them into your talent tree to empower or transform them entirely with new skill trees.



  • ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Team up with up to four other players in cooperative adventures that reward both combined effort and individual skill. Each player's choice of skills will shape their contribution and role in the party.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD™ FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or Intel® Arc™ A380 or AMD Radeon™ R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K or AMD Ryzen™ 1300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or Intel® Arc™ A750 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Carbon is Action RPG set in cyberpunk/biopunk world. Create your path to power through 18 uniquely themed specializations in the passive skill tree. Carbon is developed by a team of industry veterans and ARPG enthusiasts who have long felt that the sci-fi theme was underrepresented in this genre.
